mainBoard.flavorText: "Find solace in the sun? Burning, blinding, laying secrets bare? No, solace is found under the blanket of cold."

foreignData.flavorText: „Gibt die Sonne dir Trost? Sie brennt, sie blendet dich, sie deckt Geheimnisse auf? Nein, wahren Trost findet man nur unter einer Decke aus Frost."
foreignData.name: Raureif-Auftragsmagier
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Tappe oder enttappe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl. Spiele diese Fähigkeit nur, falls du vier oder mehr verschneite bleibende Karten kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Disfrutar del sol? ¿Que quema, ciega, revela los secretos? No, yo encuentro paz bajo el manto del frío."
foreignData.name: Auxiliar de mago brisa escarchado
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Gira o endereza el permanente objetivo. Juega esta habilidad sólo si controlas cuatro o más permanentes nevados.

foreignData.flavorText: « Trouver sanctuaire au soleil ? Le soleil brûlant, aveuglant, exposant tous les secrets ? Non, le vrai sanctuaire est caché sous la couverture du froid. »
foreignData.name: Mage de force de Soufflegivre
foreignData.text: {1}, {T} : Engagez ou dégagez le permanent ciblé. Ne jouez cette capacité que si vous contrôlez au moins quatre permanents neigeux.

foreignData.flavorText: "Trovare conforto nel sole, che brucia, acceca, rivela di segreti? No, il conforto si può trovare solo sotto un manto di freddo."
foreignData.name: Mago Specialista di Ventogelo
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: TAPpa o STAPpa un permanente bersaglio. Gioca questa abilità solo se controlli almeno quattro permanenti neve.

foreignData.flavorText: 太陽に癒しを求めるだと？ 燃え盛る、眼を潰す、秘密を露にする物にか？ 違う。極寒の帳の下以外に癒しなどあるものか。
foreignData.name: 霧氷風の特務魔道士
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}：パーマネント１つを対象とし、それをタップまたはアンタップする。 この能力は、あなたが４つ以上の氷雪パーマネントをコントロールしている場合にのみプレイできる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: "Encontrar consolo no sol? Que queima, cega e traz à luz os segredos? Não, o consolo é encontrado embaixo de um cobertor de gelo."
foreignData.name: Mago Especialista Vento-Gélido
foreignData.text: {1}, {T}: Vire ou desvire a permanente alvo. Use esta habilidade somente se você controlar quatro ou mais permanentes da neve.

foreignData.flavorText: "Успокоение в солнечном свете? Обжигающем, ослепляющем, обнажающем все тайны? Нет, успокоение есть только под покровом холода".
foreignData.name: Ледоветренный маг на службе
foreignData.text: {U}, {T}: Поверните или разверните целевой перманент. Разыгрывайте эту способность, только если вы контролируете 4 или более снежных перманента.

foreignData.flavorText: 「自太阳寻求慰藉？ 炽热，眩目，暴露所有秘密？ 不，慰藉只存于寒冷的覆掩下。」
foreignData.name: 霜风会特务法师
foreignData.text: {1}，{T}：横置或重置目标永久物。 你只可以于你操控四个或更多雪境永久物时使用此异能。

mainBoard.originalText: {1}, {T}: Tap or untap target permanent. Play this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.
mainBoard.text: {1}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.

mainBoard.flavorText: Not all of Terisiare's flooding was natural . . . .

mainBoard.text:
{T}, Sacrifice a creature and a Swamp: Destroy target nonartifact creature. It can't be regenerated.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature and a snow Swamp: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Although my official log will state there is no evidence pointing to the existence of the Mistfolk, my certainty is lessened by the cursed consistency of the expedition's eyewitness accounts." —Disa the Restless, journal entry
mainBoard.name: Mistfolk
mainBoard.text: {U}: Counter target spell that targets Mistfolk.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Whether frozen or fertile, the land is our ally. It awaits the call to battle."

foreignData.flavorText: „Ob gefroren oder fruchtbar, das Land ist unser Verbündeter. Es wartet nur darauf, von uns zu Hilfe gerufen zu werden."

foreignData.text: {U}, {T}: Ein verschneites Land deiner Wahl wird zu einer 2/2 blauen Elementarkreatur mit Flugfähigkeit. Es ist immer noch ein Land.

foreignData.flavorText: "Ya sea helada o fértil, la tierra es nuestra aliada. Espera que la convoquen a la batalla."

foreignData.text: {U}, {T}: La tierra nevada objetivo se convierte en una criatura Elemental azul 2/2 con la habilidad de volar. Sigue siendo una tierra.

foreignData.flavorText: « Gelée ou fertile, la terre est notre alliée. Elle attend l'appel au combat. »

foreignData.text: {U}, {T} : Le terrain neigeux ciblé devient une créature 2/2 bleue Élémental avec le vol. C'est toujours un terrain.

foreignData.flavorText: "Che sia fertile o gelata, la terra è sempre nostra alleata. Attende solo la chiamata alle armi."
foreignData.name: Destagelo di Balduvia
foreignData.text: {U}, {T}: La terra neve bersaglio diventa una creatura Elementale 2/2 blu con volare. È ancora una terra.

foreignData.flavorText: 凍っていようと肥えていようと、この地は我らの味方だ。 戦いの声がかかるのを待っているのだ。
foreignData.name: バルデュヴィアの霜覚師
foreignData.text: {U}, {T}：氷雪土地１つを対象とする。それは飛行を持つ青の２/２のエレメンタル･クリーチャーになる。 それは土地でもある。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: "Seja congelada ou fértil, a terra é nossa aliada. Ela aguarda o chamado para a batalha."

foreignData.text: {U}, {T}: O terreno da neve alvo torna-se uma criatura azul 2/2 do tipo Elemental com a habilidade de voar. Ela ainda conta como um terreno.

foreignData.flavorText: "Неважно, промерзла она или плодоносит. Земля все равно остается нашей союзницей. Она ожидает призыва к битве".
foreignData.name: Бальдувийский пробуждатель
foreignData.text: {U}, {T}: Целевая снежная земля становится синим существом Элементаль 2/2 со способностью Полет. При этом она остается землей.

foreignData.flavorText: 「不论霜封或苍绿，大地都是我们的盟友。 它静待着战呼响动。」
foreignData.name: 博都维唤霜师
foreignData.text: {U}，{T}：目标雪境地成为2/2蓝色，具飞行异能的元素生物。 它仍然是地。

mainBoard.name: Balduvian Frostwaker
mainBoard.originalText: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.

rulings.text: Balduvian Frostwaker’s effect has no duration. The snow land is a creature as long as it’s on the battlefield.
If an affected land later loses the supertype snow, Balduvian Frostwaker’s effect doesn’t end. The land will remain a creature.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

mainBoard.text: {U}, {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.

mainBoard.flavorText: The Rimewind wizards strove to perpetuate a magical winter. Their unnatural snows birthed unnatural beasts.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Raureif-Zauberer bemühten sich, künstlich den Winter zu bewahren Ihr unnatürlicher Schnee erzeugte unnatürliche Bestien.

foreignData.text:
Fliegend

foreignData.text:
Volare

foreignData.flavorText: 霧氷風の魔術師達は、魔法の冬を永遠のものとするために励み続けていた。 そんな彼らの不自然な雪が不自然な獣を生み出した。

foreignData.flavorText: Ледоветренные маги стремились продлить зиму, вызванную волшебством. Неестественные снега породили неестественных существ.

foreignData.flavorText: 霜风会的法术师竭尽心力，要以法术创造永不结束的寒冬。 在这违逆自然的冰雪中，诞生了违逆自然的野兽。

mainBoard.name: Phantasmal Fiend

rulings.text: Note that the wording “Effects that alter the creature’s power alter its toughness instead, and vice versa, this turn” has been removed.

Effects that switch power and toughness are always applied last when determining a creature’s power and toughness, even if other power/toughness-changing effects are created later in the turn. For example, if you activate Phantasmal Fiend’s first ability, it will become 2/4. Then if you activate its second ability, it will become 4/2. Then if you activate its first ability again, it will become 3/3.
Effects that switch power and toughness apply after all other effects that change power and/or toughness, regardless of which effect was created first.
Switching a creature’s power and toughness twice (or any even number of times) effectively returns the creature to the power and toughness it had before any switches.

mainBoard.text:
{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

于寒钢核心进场时，选择一个颜色。
{T}：加一点该色之法术力到你的法术力池中。

mainBoard.name: Coldsteel Heart
mainBoard.originalText:
Coldsteel Heart comes into play tapped.
As Coldsteel Heart comes into play, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.
mainBoard.text:
Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped.
As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

rulings.text: “Snow” has no particular meaning or rules associated with it.
Since this is a basic land, you may have any number of it in a Constructed deck in any format in which the _Masters Edition II_ set, the _Coldsnap_ set, or the _Ice Age_ set is legal.
In Limited events, you can’t add basic snow lands to your deck from outside your card pool. You may add only lands named Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest, as normal.
Effects that target nonbasic lands can’t target basic snow lands.
“Snow” has no particular meaning or rules associated with it.
Since this is a basic land, you may have any number of it in a Constructed deck in any format in which the _Masters Edition II_ set, the _Coldsnap_ set, or the _Ice Age_ set is legal.
In Limited events, you can’t add basic snow lands to your deck from outside your card pool. You may add only lands named Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest, as normal.
Effects that target nonbasic lands can’t target basic snow lands.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Now caged in Winter's bitter chill, Our people cry, their voices shrill— Eternal cold breaks down their will." —The Dynasty of Winter Kings

foreignData.flavorText: „Von Winters kaltem Atem eingehüllt Weint unser Volk in lauter Klage, Ewige Kälte bricht ihren Willen." —Die Dynastie der Winterkönige
foreignData.name: Frostmarschen
foreignData.text:
Die Frostmarschen kommen getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {U} oder {B}.

foreignData.flavorText: "En el amargo frío del Invierno nuestra gente está atrapada, nuestro pueblo grita, su voz elevada; el frío eterno deja su voluntad quebrada." —La Dinastía de los Reyes Invernales
foreignData.name: Cenagal escarchado
foreignData.text:
El Cenagal escarchado entra en juego girado.
{T}: Agrega {U} o {B} a tu reserva de maná.

foreignData.flavorText: « Prisonnier du froid mordant de l'hiver, Notre peuple se lamente et se désespère — Le froid éternel ronge leur caractère. » —La dynastie des Rois de l'hiver
foreignData.name: Marécage gelé
foreignData.text:
Le Marécage gelé arrive en jeu engagé.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B} à votre réserve.

foreignData.flavorText: "Intrappolata nel morso gelato dell'Inverno, La nostra gente piange, le loro voci stridule— Il freddo eterno spezza la loro volontà." —La Dinastia dei Re dell'Inverno
foreignData.name: Palude Ghiacciata
foreignData.text:
La Palude Ghiacciata entra in gioco TAPpata.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B} alla tua riserva di mana.

foreignData.flavorText: "厳冬"の熾烈な寒さに出口無く 人々は嘆き、その声は耳を裂く―― 永遠の冷気はその意思を砕く ――叙事詩「冬の王の統治」
foreignData.name: 霜の湿地
foreignData.text:
霜の湿地はタップ状態で場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{U}か{B}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: "Agora aprisionado no frio pungente do inverno, Nosso povo grita, suas vozes choram com o gélido inferno— Seus desejos estraçalhados pelo frio eterno." —A Dinastia dos Reis do Inverno
foreignData.name: Pântano do Gelo
foreignData.text:
Pântano do Gelo entra em jogo virado.
{T}: Adicione {U} ou {B} à sua reserva de mana.

foreignData.flavorText: "Настала зима. Ее холод силен. Рыданья доносятся с разных сторон. Дух сломлен - морозом народ покорен." — Династия Зимних королей
foreignData.name: Снежная топь
foreignData.text:
Снежная топь входит в игру повернутой.
{T}: Добавьте {U} или {B} в свой запас маны.

foreignData.flavorText: 「严冬凛寒咨意囚系， 人民悲号，其音凄厉～ 无尽严寒溃碎志意。」 ～严冬王朝
